abstract: Donald Trump took questions from listeners in a conference call with Michele Bachmann that she said drew 200,000 people.
snippet: Donald Trump took questions from listeners in a conference call with Michele Bachmann that she said drew 200,000 people.
lead_paragraph: He has had pizza in Times Square with Sarah Palin. He has dined at the swank Jean Georges restaurant on Central Park with Gov. Rick Perry of Texas. And on Monday night, Donald Trump joined Representative Michele Bachmann on a telephone conference call, the latest evidence for his strange king-making role in the Republican nominating race.

headline.main: Trump Joins Bachmann on Call With Supporters
